acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: These materials came to the Library of Virginia in shipments of court papers from Charlotte County.

bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: The memorandum book of an unidentified agency that conducted business in Charlotte County during the late nineteenth century.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: Memorandum book, 1874-1882, records the financial status of businesses and merchants in Charlotte County. Entries underneath name of business or merchant are entered in chronological order and contain critical remarks regarding their credit, financial worth, and work ethic. Volume is 108 pages.
